feed.title: Track Awesome Godot Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of free/libre plugins, scripts and add-ons for Godot

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Jul 07 - Jul 13, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Beehave (⭐2.5k) - Enables you to create robust NPC AI systems using behavior trees.

Other / Godot version unknown

  • gdvm (GitHub (⭐20)) - Command-line version manager for Godot Engine, allowing you to easily install and switch between different Godot versions on Windows, macOS, and Linux (x86, x86_64, and ARM64).
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jul 07 - Jul 13, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Jun 30 - Jul 06, 2025
entry.content:
Templates / Godot 4

  • MechanicalFlower Godot Template (⭐46) - Template with code formatting, license tracking, addons management and CI/CD.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Godot Radial Menu (⭐297) - A radial menu written in shader code for performance.
  • PowerKey (⭐9) - Easy-to-use dynamic translation of text & other variables. Also offers GDScript execution on Nodes, without needing to attach a script.
  • Scene Library (⭐75) - A tool for organizing Godot scenes with efficiency.
  • Wwise (⭐342) - Wwise audio middleware integration.

Modules / Godot version unknown

  • Open Adaptive Music Library (⭐59)

GDScript/C# editor support / Godot version unknown

  • Visual Studio Code
    • C# Tools for Godot Visual Studio Code Extension - Debugger and utilities for working with Godot C# projects in VSCode.
    • gdformat Visual Studio Code Extension - Formatter for GDScript in Visual Studio Code.
    • godot-tools Visual Studio Code Extension - A complete set of tools to code games with Godot Engine in Visual Studio Code. Includes a GDScript language client.
    • GUT Visual Studio Code Extension (⭐39) - Run GUT framework unit/integration tests directly from the Visual Studio Code Editors.

Other / Godot version unknown

  • Godot Package Manager (⭐15) - Package manager for Godot using npm.
  • gd-com npm package - Communicate with Godot clients using Node.js.
entry.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Jun 30 - Jul 06, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Jun 02 - Jun 08, 2025
entry.content:
Projects / Godot 4

  • Arrow (⭐1k) - A tool to design game narratives with nodes.

Templates / Godot 4

  • COGITO (⭐1.4k) - First Person Immersive Sim Template Project, providing a framework for creating interactable objects, various items to use and mechanics to influence the player and game environment.
  • Crystal Bit Godot Game Template (⭐761) - Opinionated game template. It includes continuous integration, scene loading with graphic transitions and game pause handling.
  • First Person Starter (⭐811) - Template with First Person Controller, easily adjustable from the Inspector.
  • Godot-GameTemplate (⭐1.4k) - Template with all necessary stuff taken care of. Designed for pixel art games.

Demos / Godot 4

  • Godot Demo Projects (⭐7.1k) - Official Godot demo projects (everything except the TPS demo).
  • Godot experiments (⭐870) - Several 2D, 3D and VR experiments.
  • OpenRPG (⭐2.3k) - JRPG-style game demo and template.
  • TPS Demo (⭐1.1k) - Official Godot third person shooter (TPS) demo with high quality graphics.
  • voxelgame (⭐638) - Minecraft-like voxel terrain demo, utilising the godot_voxel module.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • AgonesSDK (⭐75) - Plugin to add Agones (⭐6.4k) SDK functionality to Godot.
  • AntialiasedLine2D (⭐152) - Higher-quality antialiased Line2D and Polygon2D drawing compared to the default Godot implementation (all rendering methods, all platforms).
  • Aseprite Wizard (⭐1.1k) - Plugin for importing animations from Aseprite as SpriteFrames.
  • Dialogic (⭐46) - Create dialogs, characters and scenes to display conversations.
  • FMOD GDNative (⭐612) - Plugin to use the FMOD audio engine in GDScript.
  • func_godot (⭐507) - Import maps using the Quake MAP file format, commonly made using an editor such as TrenchBroom.
  • GDGIFExporter (⭐134) - GIF exporter made entirely in GDScript.
  • godot-ink (⭐686) - A C# (Mono) plugin to integrate stories writen in ink (⭐4.4k), a scripting language for writing interactive narrative.
  • Godot Polygon 2D Fracture (⭐370) - Two simple scripts for fracturing and cutting polygons.
  • Godot SQLite (⭐1.1k) - GDNative wrapper for SQLite, making it possible to use SQLite databases as data storage in your project.
  • GUT (⭐2.1k) - Utility for writing unit tests in GDScript.
  • obs-websocket-gd (⭐106) - Script and editor plugin to control Open Broadcaster Software from Godot via obs-websocket.
  • Phantom Camera (⭐2.7k) - Designed to provide and simplify common behaviors for the built-in Camera2D and Camera3D nodes.
  • ProtonScatter (⭐2.5k) - Automates the positioning of assets in a scene.
  • Ridiculous Coding (⭐918) - Makes your coding experience in Godot 1000× more ridiculous.
  • SimpleGodotCRTShader (⭐372) - A simple Godot shader that simulates CRT Displays.
  • Terrain3D (⭐3.1k) - A high performance, editable 3D terrain system.
  • UI Design Tool (⭐392) - Intuitive design workflow for UIs in the editor.
  • YATI (Yet Another Tiled Importer (⭐214) - This is an addon for importing files (.tmx, .tmj) created by the Tiled Map Editor (⭐12k).

Modules / Godot 4

  • GodotSteam (⭐3.4k) - Steam API library binding for Godot. Supports Windows, macOS and Linux.
  • godot-voxel (⭐3.1k) - Module for creating volumetric worlds.
  • spout-gd (⭐57) - Share OpenGL textures across Windows applications through your GPU using Spout (⭐837).
entry.summary: 32 awesome projects updated on Jun 02 - Jun 08, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on May 19 - May 25, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • DotnetQuestSystem (⭐11) - A simple implementation of a quest system on .NET with an interface for Godot.
  • Inventory Manager (⭐19) - Minimalistic inventory manager for easily adding and removing items with variable stack sizes and stack count limits.

Other / Godot version unknown

  • godot-launcher (⭐1) - A desktop application built with Python that simplifies the Godot Engine development environment management.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on May 19 - May 25, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Apr 07 - Apr 13, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • HCoroutines (⭐33) - Powerful C# coroutine library for Godot.
  • ThemeGen (⭐134) - Easily create themes using GDScript code, allowing you to reuse styles, recombine them, and effortlessly reuse and share colours between components.

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Feb 03 - Feb 09, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Icon Explorer - Browse and save icons from popular icon collections.
  • License Manager - Manage license and copyright for third party graphics, software or libraries. Group them into categories, add descriptions or web links.
  • QR Code - QR Code generation either with the included QRCodeRect node or use the encoding result of the QRCode class.

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Jan 27 - Feb 02, 2025
entry.content:
Projects / Godot 4

  • Material Maker (⭐4.2k) - Create PBR materials procedurally (similar to Substance Designer).

Templates / Godot 4

  • Takin Godot Template (⭐333) - Template with a save file system, localization, UI (main menu, save files, options, credits), example game scene, plugins (scene and audio managers, logger, linter, resource viewer), placeholders (music, sfx), github workflows and various utility scripts.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jan 27 - Feb 02, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Jan 13 - Jan 19, 2025
entry.content:
3D / Godot 4

  • open-fpsz - An open-source, fast-paced multiplayer shooter game inspired by Tribes, with jetpacks, skis and vehicles.

Engine themes / Godot version unknown

  • Catppuccin Theme (⭐169) - A soothing pastel theme offered in four different flavors.
  • Godot Minimal Theme (⭐2.9k) - A theme that aims to correct odd spacing and formatting in the default Godot theme without changing the overall look and feel.

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Nov 25 - Dec 01, 2024
entry.content:
2D / Godot 4

  • A Dark Forest (⭐114) - Minimalistic incremental game inspired by "A Dark Room".

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • CSConnector (Contextual Signal/Setup Connector) - Provides a clean interface to dynamically find, setup, and connect to descendant nodes through the scene tree.
  • System Bar Color Changer (⭐29) - An Android plugin that enables you to dynamically change the colors of the status bar and navigation bar, and also supports enabling translucent system bars for a modern, immersive UI experience.
  • Your Buil - A plugin that makes it as easy as possible to use build data like git commit hashes in your build.
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Nov 25 - Dec 01, 2024

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Quest Manager (⭐94) - Minimalistic quest manager able to track quest state at runtime for easier debugging.

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Oct 28 - Nov 03, 2024
entry.content:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • QuestSystem (⭐395) - A simple and extensible quest manager and creator.
  • Talo (⭐116) - A self-hostable game backend for managing players, leaderboards, stats, saving/loading data and more.

Modules / Godot 4

  • Keyring (⭐13) - Utility to interact with the OS keyring to store credentials.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Oct 28 - Nov 03, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Oct 14 - Oct 20, 2024
entry.content:
2D / Godot 3

  • Blipshift (⭐14) - Simple top-down moving platforms game.
  • Circle Jump (⭐142) - Mobile arcade game, addicting and enjoyable. How-to-made tutorial is available, so you can recreate it yourself and learn Godot.
  • Haldric (⭐368) - Official work-in-progress reimplementation of Battle for Wesnoth.
  • Memory Game (⭐29) - Simple Memory game.

3D / Godot 4

  • Thrive (⭐3.2k) - A free, open-source game about the evolution of life (Mono).

3D / Godot 3

  • Rapid Rescue (⭐75) - Rapid Rescue is a local multiplayer strategy game inspired by Labyrinth.

Demos / Godot 3

  • Realistic Water Shader (⭐814) - Realistic 3D water shader with foam and caustics.
  • The Tower (⭐28) - A voxel-based parkour game to show the capabilities of the Voxelman module.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • 3D Auto Collision Generator (⭐60) - Generate collision for multiple 3D objects in one click.
  • CReverter (Composite Reverter) - Memento-based undo/redo utility that supports composition.
  • Cyclops Level Builder (⭐1.3k) - A level builder for quick prototypes and proof-of-concepts.
  • Dialogue Manager (⭐2.9k) - A simple but powerful text based branching dialogue editor and runtime. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) (⭐51) - Fast Fourier Transform in GDScript.
  • Friflo.Engine.ECS (⭐174) - High-performance C# ECS with simple API. Supports .NET, WASM/WebAssembly, Native AOT, Godot, Unity, MonoGame, ... (Godot 3 and 4)
  • GdUnit4 (⭐750) - Godot Unit Testing Framework.
  • Godot Spin Button (⭐99) - Horizontal Selector with extended options.
  • HTerrain (⭐2k) - Heightmap-based terrain. Supports texture painting, colouring, holes, level of detail and grass. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Importality (⭐414) - raster graphics and animations importers: Aseprite, Krita, Pencil2D, Piskel, Pixelorama and others.
  • Input Helper (⭐934) - A helper for detecting input devices and remapping controls. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Orchestrator (⭐1.2k) - Dialog and visual-scripting subsystem for 2D and 3D games.
  • Scene Manager (⭐470) - Make nice and customizable scene transitions in one line of code. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • SignalVisualizer (⭐518) - Displays the current scene's signals and connections in a easy to read graph and tree dock.
  • Simplified Flight Simulation library (⭐238) - A library that helps you create a simple airplane/helicopter/spaceship flight simulator. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • SmartShape2D (⭐1.5k) - A 2D terrain tool. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Virtual Joystick (⭐852) - A virtual joystick for touchscreens. Simple to use and with useful options. (Godot 3 and 4)

Plugins and scripts / Godot 3

  • 2D Day/Night Cycle (⭐349) - A ☀️ Day / 🌔 Night cycle for 2D.
  • 2D Destructible Objects (⭐411) - A script that takes a sprite, divides it into blocks and makes them explode💥.
  • Anima (⭐740) - Run sequential and parallel animations with less code compared to Tween.
  • AutoColliders (⭐11) - Allows the automatic generation of colliders for Sprites, with planned expansion to handle 3D meshes in the future.
  • BoxCam2D (⭐19) - Simplest way to implement grid-based 2D camera movement.
  • CRT Shader (⭐312) - A Godot shader that simulates CRT Displays with many shader parameters.
  • CSG Mesh Exporter (.OBJ) (⭐56) - Export CSG nodes to OBJ meshes to improve editing performance.
  • EffekseerForGodot3 (⭐136) - Import Effekseer particle effects.
  • Escoria (⭐812) - Point & click adventure game framework. (Godot 2 and 3)
  • gdstats (⭐35) - A library of pseudorandom number generators for common statistical distributions.
  • Godot NExt (⭐980) - A set of basic node extensions.
  • GodotNotificationCenter (⭐59) - A notification center.
  • GodotPhoenixChannels (⭐291) - A GDScript and Godot Engine implementation for the Channels API of the Phoenix Framework.
  • GodotRx (⭐95) - Reactive extensions for Godot C# (Mono).
  • GodotTIE (⭐293) - Text Interface Engine to control text output (like in a RPG dialogue). (Godot 2 and 3)
  • InGrid (⭐114) - Infinite scrolling grid.
  • NI mate Motion Capture (⭐30) - Animate Skeletons with a Microsoft Kinect sensor.
  • Scrolling Background (⭐29) - A scrolling background node. (Godot 2 and 3)
  • StoryTeller Engine (⭐33) - Dialog and interactive fiction engine.
  • Tiled importer (⭐875) - Import maps from Tiled.
  • TileSet Builder (⭐18) - Quickly build tilesets with style.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 2

  • gterm (⭐102) - GUI control that draws something similar to *nix terminal emulators.

Plugins and scripts / Godot version unknown

  • Godot Recipes - A large collection of tutorials and techniques, both big and small.
  • Godot Shaders (⭐3.5k) - A large library of free and open-source shaders for 2D and 3D.

Modules / Godot 4

  • Entity Spell System (⭐171) - An entity and spell system for complex (optionally multiplayer) RPGs. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • GodotHook (⭐54) - A lite custom event system for Godot Engine. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • godot-jolt (⭐2.4k) - Allows you to use the Jolt Physics Engine (⭐8.1k).
  • godot-luaAPI (⭐416) - Module for creating sandboxed modding APIs with Lua. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • godot-rapier-2d (⭐593) - A 2D Rapier (⭐4.6k) physics server for Godot.
  • Texture Packer (⭐67) - Tools to layer, pack, and merge textures at runtime. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Voxelman (⭐105) - A voxel engine with more focus on editor integration, gameplay-related features, and extendability. (Godot 3 and 4)

Modules / Godot 3

  • FMOD Integration (⭐181) - Module to integrate the FMOD audio engine in Godot.
  • Gdnet for Godot 3 (⭐128) - An ENet wrapper for Godot 3.
  • godotcord (⭐54) - A wrapper for the Discord Game SDK.
  • godot-python (⭐2k) - Python support for Godot 3.

Modules / Godot version unknown

  • godot-anl (⭐111) - A wrapper for Accidental Noise Library (⭐82) with a visual noise editing support.

Other / Godot version unknown

  • godot-gdscript-toolkit (⭐1.2k) - Independent set of command line tools for working with GDScript - parser, linter and formatter.
entry.summary: 62 awesome projects updated on Oct 14 - Oct 20, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Sep 30 - Oct 06, 2024
entry.content:
2D / Godot 4

  • Librerama - A free/libre fast-paced arcade collection of mini-games.
  • Unknown Horizons (⭐769) - Official work-in-progress reimplementation of Unknown Horizons.

2D / Godot 3

  • Breakable (⭐63) - A breakout-like game.
  • ROTA (⭐269) - Gravity-bending puzzle platformer game.

3D / Godot 4

  • Super Tux Party - A free/libre and open-source party game that is meant to replicate the feel of games such as Mario Party.
  • Tanks of Freedom II (⭐317) - Free turn-based isometric strategy game in voxel art.

Projects / Godot 4

  • Lorien (⭐6k) - Infinite-canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Supports drawing tablets and pressure sensitivity.
  • Pixelorama (⭐8.3k) - 2D pixel art editor.
  • ProtonGraph (⭐1.5k) - Node-based tool for procedural content creation. Like visual scripting, but for 3D model generation (needs custom engine modules).

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Shaker (⭐349) - Plugin that adds shaking and emitters for cameras, nodes or any property in 2D and 3D.
entry.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Sep 30 - Oct 06, 2024

XR / Godot 3

Templates / Godot 4

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Godot XR Tools (⭐608) - Basic components for XR development.
  • TerraBrush (⭐912) - Minimal Terrain heightmap editor that features sculpting, painting textures, LOD, and MultiZones.

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Oct 10 - Oct 16, 2022
entry.content:
Templates / Godot 3

  • bendn's Godot Template (⭐43) - Game template using the gpm (⭐15), with itch.io pushing and builds automated. Starter CLI included.

Unofficial Godot builds / Godot version unknown

  • bend-n's 2D builds (⭐27) - Godot builds optimized for size with these modules disabled (⭐27). Also includes misc non breaking patches.

Other / Godot version unknown

  • godot-actions (⭐33) - Composite actions for exporting, setting up, and pushing Godot projects to itch.io through Github Actions.

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on May 17 - May 23, 2021
entry.content:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 3

  • NativeLib (⭐94) - Plugin management system designed to easily operate with native libraries for iOS/Android. It also takes care about plugin dependencies and provides hassle-free native libs updating. Attribution and analytics: Adjust, Amplitude, AppsFlyer, Flurry, GameAnalytics, Tenjin. Ads networks and mediation: AdColony, AppLovin, TapDaq. GDPR and privacy: App Tracking Transparency, Ogury. Social: Facebook. Universal backend solution: Firebase.

entry.summary: 16 awesome projects updated on Jan 18 - Jan 24, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Godot Updates on Jan 11 - Jan 17, 2021
entry.content:
2D / Godot 3

  • TuxBuilder (⭐215) - Work-in-progress reimplementation of SuperTux.

2D / Godot 2

  • BlockPop (⭐28) - A simple Breakout clone.
  • Bombs (⭐18) - Simple mobile game. You need to touch bombs to defuse them.
  • Captain Holetooth (⭐69) - Explorative platformer in a detailed world. Geared towards younger players.
  • Dolphin Island 2 (⭐180) - Platformer game made for the A Game By It's Cover 2015 Game Jam.
  • DynaDungeons (⭐230) - Bomberman clone in a fantasy universe.
  • Kraken-Rampage (⭐6) - Ludum Dare 33 entry made in 48 hours.
  • Minehunter (⭐19) - A Minesweeper clone.
  • Minilens - Free puzzle platform game.
  • Mountain of Hope (⭐12) - Game made on Theater Game Jam (PGA 2015).
  • Ninja-Training (⭐38) - Small running game done as 1 hour challenge.
  • No hope (⭐9) - Ludum Dare 33 entry made in 48 hours.
  • Planet Rider (⭐36) - 2D physics parkour game in an alien environment.
  • Platshoot (⭐48) - A 2D shooter game.
  • Ringed (⭐94) - Top-down shooter with extensive usage of light effects.
  • Tanks of Freedom (⭐1.2k) - Free turn-based isometric strategy game.
  • Three Hungry Mice (⭐7) - Breakout game with mice made for the Godot Engine Jam of March 2016.

3D / Godot 3

  • Broken Seals (⭐404) - A work-in-progress third person action RPG with multiplayer support (needs custom engine modules).
  • Meteorite (⭐321) - A lowres metroidvania FPS, inspired by Metroid Prime, made for LOWREZJAM 2018.

3D / Godot 2

  • Cheese Hunter (⭐16) - A game for Godot Engine Jam of March 2016.

Projects / Godot 3

  • Godello (⭐842) - A Trello-like kanban board application made with Godot. A proof of concept for complex non-game applications with Godot, as well real-time online interactions between multiple users. Includes backend code.

Templates / Godot 3

  • Minimum Game (⭐79) - Template top-down 2D pixel art game, with multiple rooms, a HUD, menus, and autosaving.
  • Multiplayer First Person Shooter (⭐64) - Multiplayer first person shooter example project.
  • Multiplayer Third Person Shooter (⭐66) - Multiplayer third person shooter example project.

Demos / Godot 3

  • Open Source A-RPG Demo (⭐1.1k) - RPG demo.

Demos / Godot 2

  • FPS Test (⭐60) - A singleplayer FPS test. Physics work, but there are no enemies and no proper shooting.
  • Pathfinding 2d (⭐70) - A demo project demonstrating pathfinding using a tilemap.
  • UDP Snapshot interpolation (⭐66) - Lets you connect to a server and view networked physics.
  • UDP State synchronization (⭐164) - A more efficient networking demo than the snapshot interpolation one.
  • Voxel Game (⭐74) - Minecraft-like voxel terrain demo.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 3

  • Cartographer (⭐392) - Heightmap-based 3D terrain editor.
  • Code Snapshot (⭐58) - A plugin which lets you take beautified screenshots of your code within the editor.
  • Delaunator GDScript (⭐87) - A GDScript library for Delaunay triangulation of 2D points.
  • GitHub integration (⭐230) - Interact with GitHub without opening your browser.
  • godotccd (⭐67) - Fast 3D collision checks in Godot using libccd.
  • godotdetour (⭐123) - A GDNative implementation of the detour/detourcrowd library.
  • Godot Mixing Desk (⭐667) - Make procedural sound and adaptive/procedural music with a few nodes and a couple lines of code.
  • Godot-Trail-System (⭐357) - Advanced 2D/3D trail system.
  • Level of Detail (LOD) (⭐242) - Level of detail add-on for meshes, lights and particles. Can improve performance in large scenes.
  • Volumetrics (⭐345) - Voxel-based volumetric lighting and fog plugin.
  • VPainter (⭐495) - 3D vertex painting plugin.
  • Waterways (⭐1.2k) - Tool to generate river meshes with flow and foam maps based on Bézier curves.
  • Yume Visual Novel Editor (⭐94) - An integrated editor for creating visual novel games.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 2

  • Auto Tile Layer (⭐30) - Allows automatic 2D tiling using RPG Maker's Autotile format.
  • Grass Plugin (⭐73) - A plugin to handle huge amounts of grass, foliages and other vegetations.
  • SUTjoystick - Easy gamepad support for GNU/Linux and Windows.
entry.summary: 46 awesome projects updated on Jan 11 - Jan 17, 2021
